# Frucht graph.
# Roughly:
#  4-----3
#  |\    |\
#  | \   5-0
#  |  \ /  |
#  |   6   |
#  |   |   |
#  |   |   |
#  |  11   |
#  |  / \  |
#  2-10  9-1
#   \|   |/ 
#    8---7

# Initial vertex coords exactly from the above
#2 2 0
#2 -2 0
#-2 -2 0
#1 3 0
#-2 3 0
#1 2 0
#0 1 2
#1 -3 0
#-1 -3 0
#1 -2 0
#-1 -2 0
#0 -1 2

.5 .5 0
.5 -.5 0
-.5 -.5 0
.25 .75 0
-.5 .75 0
.25 .5 0
0 .25 .5
.25 -.75 0
-.25 -.75 0
.25 -.5 0
-.25 -.5 0
0 -.25 .5

# Initial vertex coords (the result of a previous optimization
# in which faces are constrained to be planar and try to be regular)
#0.7982705934880118 0.4604005029770987 -0.37254837217217185
#0.8759424236826427 -0.30834482630296145 -0.41032016728831866
#-0.8344757986011837 -0.14718615854748762 -0.31591832973855344
#0.10944847385993844 0.8509135532580918 -0.38838477122855375
#-0.5383928182101781 0.5386078671048004 -0.17495060587703354
#0.43258660898648554 0.8042232004895721 0.19127379323665455
#-0.08246579329088162 0.41886023817673457 0.5295132233576176
#0.33098291779305133 -0.8591727333938137 -0.4874576388149898
#-0.4315719402388122 -0.8082197365982449 -0.44724235804737184
#0.5196379694953721 -0.6464332922919211 0.17139615529987512
#-0.6303188400245359 -0.613913561039863 0.2125095430209779
#-0.05081316436007369 -0.36173505383201787 0.6281295282518923

# Edges all want to be exactly 1
0 1 == 1
0 3 == 1
2 4 == 1
3 4 == 1
0 5 == 1
3 5 == 1
5 6 == 1
4 6 == 1
1 7 == 1
2 8 == 1
7 8 == 1
1 9 == 1
7 9 == 1
2 10 == 1
8 10 == 1
6 11 == 1
9 11 == 1
10 11 == 1

# Square diagonals want to be exactly sqrt(2)
4 5 == 1.4142135623730951
3 6 == 1.4142135623730951

# Pentagon diagonals want to be >= sqrt(2)
4 10 >= 1.4142135623730951
10 6 >= 1.4142135623730951
6 2 >= 1.4142135623730951
2 11 >= 1.4142135623730951
11 4 >= 1.4142135623730951

8 9 >= 1.4142135623730951
9 10 >= 1.4142135623730951
10 7 >= 1.4142135623730951
7 11 >= 1.4142135623730951
11 8 >= 1.4142135623730951

# Hexagon diagonals want to be >= sqrt(2)
0 6 >= 1.4142135623730951
6 9 >= 1.4142135623730951
9 0 >= 1.4142135623730951
5 11 >= 1.4142135623730951
11 1 >= 1.4142135623730951
1 5 >= 1.4142135623730951
0 11 >= 1.4142135623730951
5 9 >= 1.4142135623730951
1 6 >= 1.4142135623730951

# Heptagon diagonals want to be >= sqrt(2)
3 2 >= 1.4142135623730951
3 8 >= 1.4142135623730951
3 7 >= 1.4142135623730951
3 1 >= 1.4142135623730951
4 8 >= 1.4142135623730951
4 7 >= 1.4142135623730951
4 1 >= 1.4142135623730951
4 0 >= 1.4142135623730951
2 7 >= 1.4142135623730951
2 1 >= 1.4142135623730951
2 0 >= 1.4142135623730951
8 1 >= 1.4142135623730951
8 0 >= 1.4142135623730951
7 0 >= 1.4142135623730951
